items.title: Synopsys gets an Nvidia boost. Here’s what to know.
items.description: Nvidia has made a $2 billion investment in Synopsys and has a new partnership with the maker of chip-design software.

items.title: Manufacturers shrink for 9th month in a row, ISM finds. Tariffs hurt sales and keep lid on hiring.
items.description: A closely followed manufacturing index fell to a four-month low, with executives saying business isn’t getting any better.

items.title: My brother has fallen on hard times. My sister wants to buy his house. Is that a good idea?
items.description: “She will let him live in it free of charge and continue to take care of the maintenance.”

items.title: My sons will each inherit $500K laundromats from their grandparents. How do we keep their spouses out of it?
items.description: “The businesses each have two employees who manage the day-to-day operations.”

items.title: Here’s what might turn the tide for value stocks and the broader market over growth stocks in 2026
items.description: RBC Capital’s head of U.S. equity strategy, Lori Calvasina, expects the tug-of-war with value stocks and the broader market on one side and Big Tech o...
